name: (C-42) Back Bay Private Apartment
neighborhood_overview:
Keyless Code will be released day before before check-in.

Host needs prior notice if extra linens or baby equipment are needed.

Bathroom is a bit outdated, renovating in late 2020
description:
Stay healthy with us! With all the craziness going on around us, feel comfortable knowing that our cleaners are wiping down everything! We are wiping down door knobs, keypads, and keeping our environments clean! Avoid the busy hotels and large common areas, Stay safe, clean and healthy with us!

The space
Come stay in the Back Bay! This sweet one bedroom apartment is in a older apartment building with multiple apartments. Access is easy & keyless! The building has a small elevator that fits 2 people at time (this is wonderful for heavy luggage!)

Inside the apartment you will find a queen bed, open concept updated kitchen, a couch that can fold open to a second sleeping area, and a flat screen TV (TV has been upgraded since the photos).

Guest access
Check in instructions sent via messenger 24 hours in advance provided we have all requested information from guest.

Other things to note
Keyless Code will be rele

name: (C-52) Cute One Bed, Back Bay!
neighborhood_overview:
Green line T, Hynes Station, few blocks away!
One bedroom apartment in the Heart of Back Bay. The property is located only a few blocks from Newbury Street and the green line T! Newbury Street is full of people, stores, restaurants, coffee shops and more! The closest public transportation is the green line, Hynes T stop. The apartment is also a short walk to the Hynes Convention Center.

"Affluent Back Bay is a shopping and dining destination. Along Newbury Street, well-heeled locals frequent designer boutiques, fashion chains, art galleries and patio cafes set in elegant brick townhouses. Expansive Copley Square is flanked by 1800s landmarks Trinity Church and the Boston Public Library. Mansions dot the neighborhood’s tree-lined streets, many on Paris-inspired Commonwealth Avenue."
description:
Stay healthy with us! With all the craziness going on around us, feel comfortable knowing that our cleaners are wiping down everything! We are wiping down door knobs, keypads, and keeping our environments clean! Avoid the busy hotels and large common areas, Stay safe, clean and healthy with us!

The space
This apartment is in a great location! Walkable to everything you'll need! The T is only a 5-7 min walk away! We are close to the corner of Mass ave and Comm Ave. This is a one bedroom apartment. Inside you'll find that the bedroom has a queen bed and the living room has a a small couch and offers an air mattress for a 3rd guest ! The kitchen is open concept and renovated, it has everything you need to make an adequate meal. There is laundry in the basement of the building. This apartment is on the fifth floor but there is a TINY elevator in the building as well for heavier luggage or two people!

name: (K-8) Back Bay . Kenmore Sq 2 Bedrooms
neighborhood_overview: "Affluent Back Bay is a shopping and dining destination. Along Newbury Street, well-heeled locals frequent designer boutiques, fashion chains, art galleries and patio cafes set in elegant brick townhouses. Expansive Copley Square is flanked by 1800s landmarks Trinity Church and the Boston Public Library. Mansions dot the neighborhood’s tree-lined streets, many on Paris-inspired Commonwealth Avenue."
description:
~Stay healthy with us! With all the craziness going on around us, feel comfortable knowing that our cleaners are wiping down everything! We are wiping down door knobs, keypads, and keeping our environments clean! Avoid the busy hotels and large common areas, Stay safe, clean and healthy with us!

The space
This top floor apartment has a spacious roof deck with amazing views! It is in an outstanding location, Back Bay/ Kenmore Sq! This being just a short walk to Newbury Street shops, restaurants, bars, Fenway Park and all the other great places these three areas of Boston have to offer! This is a two bedroom apartment, with a very small living room area. This apartment is ideal for someone coming in to sleep and needs the second bedroom. The living room, as shown in photos is not large. The kitchen is old but fully equipped for cooking and eating in. Each of the bedrooms has a queen sized bed . There is no elevator in this building. It's top floor walk up. Laundry
